content.html: If you're curious why everyone seems so mad about the modern frontends live débâcle - this was the *entire* "3,500 person" conference. Which sponsors paid ten grand at least for stands at, and speakers paid for their own international flights and accomodation to speak at.
content.value:
If you're curious why everyone seems so mad about the modern frontends live débâcle - this was the *entire* "3,500 person" conference.

Which sponsors paid ten grand at least for stands at, and speakers paid for their own international flights and accomodation to speak at.
